segments.text: I ’ m sick of my job , I always have to work late at night , and the company keeps me working in the office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don ’ t you find a new career where you can do what you enjoy , being outside working during the day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you suggest ? I can ’ t afford to quit my job until I get a new one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you have two choices . You could attend school during the day , or you could get a position that provides training .
segments.speaker: S2
